text.my_personal_apartment.reception.pay:
Welcome %1$s and hope you are doing well.
Before you can get your apartment, you need to pay the broker fee of %2$s x %3$s.

Let me know when you're ready to pay.
text.my_personal_apartment.reception.cla:
You are able to claim up to %2$s apartments.
Do you want to claim a apartment?
text.my_personal_apartment.reception.tel: Do you want to teleport to your apartment?
ðŸ  Teleport back, what ever that means ...
You have successfully claimed the apartment %1$s.
text.my_personal_apartment.apartment.16x: A small and empty apartment with a single room and a acacia floor to be creative.
A small and empty apartment with a single room and a oak floor to be creative.
A small and empty apartment with a single room and a spruce floor to be creative.
text.my_personal_apartment.welcome_to_ap: Welcome to your apartment! You can use the %1$s command to teleport back to your last dimension / spawn point.
You are not in the apartment dimension to use this command!
You don't have an apartment, yet.
You don't have a last dimension to teleport back to.
You will be teleported back to your last dimension.
message.my_personal_apartment.no_apartme:
It looks like you don't have an apartment yet.
Talk to reception to get a new apartment to get started!
